thread.title: CORRECTED-Uber announces contest to select third city to launch flying taxis

title: CORRECTED-Uber announces contest to select third city to launch flying taxis
text:
May 9, 2018 / 4:52 PM / Updated 14 minutes ago CORRECTED-Uber announces contest to select third city to launch flying taxis Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
(Corrects day in first paragraph to Wednesday, not Tuesday)
May 9 (Reuters) - Uber Technologies Inc announced on Wednesday an open call for the selection of a third launch city for its flying taxi project UberAIR, which it plans to build in 2020.
Dallas and Los Angeles are the first two launch cities and Uber is now looking for a city outside the United States. Reporting by Munsif Vengattil in Bengaluru; Editing by Arun Koyyur
